About.title: INTRODUCTION
body: I am a passionate and results-driven professional specializing in managing and executing impactful marketing programs, digital campaigns and partner programs. My expertise spans marketing program management, marketing strategy, integrated marketing, partner marketing, and communications. I have a proven track record of consistently fostering strong relationships with peers, clients, and stakeholders through clear communication, team collaboration and alignment to achieve both departmental and organizational goals.

In my most recent roles, I drove the strategic alignment of data center and AI programs while prioritizing partner engagement opportunities in marketing activations and product launches. These efforts increased partner participation by 20% year over year. I led cross-functional projects to execute high-impact marketing initiatives—including content syndication, digital activations, and integrated digital campaigns for partners. By streamlining processes and optimizing engagement strategies such as partner launch playbooks and a digital partner resource hub, I helped enhance partner visibility and drove go to market readiness.
About.para1: My proficiency in program and project management sets me apart as a dynamic and effective leader. I have a keen eye for detail and an exceptional skillset in managing project timelines while fostering a collaborative environment, where team members and peers are encouraged – and supported –  to contribute their best work. I tackle challenges with a dedication to excellence, constantly seeking improvement and employing strategic problem-solving.
About.para2: Previously, as a marketing and communications manager and consultant, I played a key role in driving project operations and ensuring client satisfaction. I defined and communicated expectations and success criteria while managing timelines, dependencies, issue resolution, and asset delivery across internal teams, clients, and third-party partners. Additionally, I leveraged marketing automation platforms, analytics tools, and CRM systems such as Salesforce and HubSpot, to optimize campaign performance and deliver measurable business impact.
